sql: select YR_ITEM, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY from FIGIS.TS_FI_AQUA where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM

select YR_ITEM, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY from FIGIS.TS_FI_CAPTURE where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA in (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM

select YR_ITEM, CD_FI_ENVI, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY from FIGIS.TS_FI_AQUA where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA in (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM, CD_FI_ENVI

SELECT YR_ITEM,AREA,ROUND(SUM (QUANTITY)) AS TOTAL_QUANTITYFROM (   SELECT    YR_ITEM   ,QUANTITY   ,CASE WHEN  CD_FIC_CATCH_AREA < 8 THEN 'Inland' ELSE 'Marine' END AS AREA   FROM FIGIS.TS_FI_CAPTURE   WHERE YR_ITEM >= ?   AND CD_AREA = (SELECT AREA FROM FIGIS.AREA WHERE ISO_3_CODE = ?)   AND CD_FIC_ITEM IN (SELECT ITEM_MEMB FROM FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE WHERE ITEM_GRP IN (SELECT ITEM_MEMB FROM FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE WHERE ITEM_GRP = ?)))GROUP BY YR_ITEM,AREAORDER BY YR_ITEM,AREA

select R_NUM, MIN(CASE WHEN R_NUM < 10 THEN CD_FIC_ITEM ELSE 0 END) as SPECIES, ROUND(SUM(TOTAL_SAL)) as TOT_QUANTITY from (select CD_FIC_ITEM, SUM (Quantity) as TOTAL_SAL, LEAST (ROW_NUMBER () OVER (order by SUM(Quantity) DESC), 10) as R_NUM from FIGIS.TS_FI_CAPTURE where YR_ITEM = ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by  CD_FIC_ITEM) group by R_NUM order by R_NUM

select YR_ITEM, CD_FLOW, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY, SUM(VALUE) AS TOT_VALUE from FIGIS.TS_FI_COMMODITY where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_COMMODITY in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.REF_COMMODITY_GRP where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.REF_COMMODITY_GRP where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM, CD_FLOW

select R_NUM, MIN(CASE WHEN R_NUM < 10 THEN CD_FIC_ITEM ELSE 0 END) as SPECIES, ROUND(SUM (TOTAL_SAL)) as TOT_QUANTITY from (select CD_FIC_ITEM, SUM(Quantity) as TOTAL_SAL, LEAST (ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY SUM (Quantity) DESC), 10) as R_NUM from FIGIS.TS_FI_AQUA where YR_ITEM = ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.area where ISO_3_CODE = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by CD_FIC_ITEM) group by R_NUM order by R_NUM

select YR_ITEM, CD_FIC_ITEM, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY, (SELECT FULL_NAME_E from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM FI where A.CD_FIC_ITEM=FI.FIC_ITEM) as SPECIES_NAME from FIGIS.TS_FI_AQUA A where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where iso_3_code = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM,CD_FIC_ITEM order by YR_ITEM

select YR_ITEM, CD_FIC_ITEM, sum(Quantity) as TOT_QUANTITY, (SELECT FULL_NAME_E from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM FI where C.CD_FIC_ITEM=FI.FIC_ITEM) as SPECIES_NAME from FIGIS.TS_FI_CAPTURE C where YR_ITEM >= ? and CD_AREA = (select AREA from FIGIS.AREA where iso_3_code = ?) and CD_FIC_ITEM in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP in (select ITEM_MEMB from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM_GRP_BASE where ITEM_GRP = ?)) group by YR_ITEM,CD_FIC_ITEM order by YR_ITEM

SELECT PC.YR_ITEM,PC.FOOD_SUPPLY,POP.VALUE AS POPULATION,CASE WHEN POP.VALUE = 0 or PC.FOOD_SUPPLY = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(PC.FOOD_SUPPLY/POP.VALUE,1) END AS PER_CAPITAFROM (   SELECT    FBS.YR_ITEM   ,ROUND(SUM(FBS.VALUE),0) AS FOOD_SUPPLY   ,CD_AREA   FROM FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS FBS   WHERE FBS.CD_ELEMENT=141   AND FBS.CD_AREA = (SELECT AREA FROM FIGIS.AREA WHERE ISO_3_CODE = ?)   AND YR_ITEM >= ?   GROUP BY FBS.YR_ITEM, CD_AREA ORDER BY FBS.YR_ITEM) PC, FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS_POP POPWHERE PC.YR_ITEM=POP.YR_ITEM AND POP.CD_AREA = PC.CD_AREAORDER BY YR_ITEM

SELECT FBS.SPECIES_GRP,FBS.YR_ITEM AS YEAR,ROUND(FBS.VALUE,0) AS FOOD_SUPPLY,POP.VALUE AS POPULATION,ROUND(FBS.VALUE/POP.VALUE,1) AS PER_CAPITAFROM FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS FBS , FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS_POP POPWHERE FBS.CD_AREA=POP.CD_AREA AND FBS.YR_ITEM=POP.YR_ITEM AND FBS.CD_ELEMENT=141AND FBS.YR_ITEM=(SELECT MAX(YR_ITEM) FROM FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS)AND FBS.CD_AREA = (SELECT AREA FROM FIGIS.AREA WHERE ISO_3_CODE = ?)ORDER BY FBS.SPECIES_GRP

SELECT  R1.YR_ITEM,R1.CONSUMPTION,R2.POPULATION,ROUND(R1.CONSUMPTION/R2.POPULATION,1) AS PER_CAPITAFROM (SELECT YR_ITEM,ROUND(SUM(VALUE),0) AS CONSUMPTION FROM FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS WHERE YR_ITEM>=1980 AND CD_ELEMENT=141 GROUP BY YR_ITEM ) R1LEFT JOIN (SELECT YR_ITEM,ROUND(SUM(VALUE),0) AS POPULATION FROM FIGIS.TS_FI_FBS_POP WHERE YR_ITEM >= ? GROUP BY YR_ITEM) R2 ON R1.YR_ITEM = R2.YR_ITEMWHERE R1.YR_ITEM >= ? ORDER BY R1.YR_ITEM

select YR_ITEM,round(sum(CASE WHEN SYMB_QUANTITY ='-' THEN NULLELSE QUANTITY END),3) AS TOT_QUANTITYFROM FIGIS.TS_FI_AQUAWHERE CD_FIC_ITEM = (select FIC_ITEM from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM where ALPHA3CODE='FBM')GROUP BY YR_ITEM order by YR_ITEM

select YR_ITEM,round(sum(CASE WHEN SYMB_QUANTITY ='-' THEN NULLELSE QUANTITY END),0) AS TOT_QUANTITYFROM FIGIS.TS_FI_CAPTUREWHERE CD_FIC_ITEM = (select FIC_ITEM from FIGIS.FIC_ITEM where ALPHA3CODE='FBM')GROUP BY YR_ITEM order by YR_ITEM
